description:
Scan barcodes for products like Coca-Cola, Dreyer's and more in any store across the country for instant rewards! It's free and easy. As seen in the Washington Post, NY Times, USA Today and CNN, CheckPoints is the “App That Pays You Back.”

Whether you're grocery shopping, hanging out at the mall, at a café, or even at home, you can have fun collecting easy rewards every day in millions of places.

COLLECT POINTS: When you’re out shopping, use CheckPoints in your favorite stores to scan barcodes on products to earn points toward great prizes and rewards. When you’re anywhere else, you can watch videos and more to earn even more points so you can redeem your prize faster. With CheckPoints, you can pick up points no matter where you are on the map!

GET REWARDED: Redeem your points for fabulous FREE rewards like Amazon.com and Walmart gift cards, American Airlines miles, cool gadgets like popular tablets and gaming systems, and even donations to charities!
WIN BIG: Look for opportunities to collect coins and use them in our bonus games. Play our Paradise Slots or Jungle Lotto scratcher games to win up to 150,000 points instantly! Over 3.5 million people have already won over $5,000,000 in points and prizes.

*****

MORE POINTS: Follow CheckPoints on Facebook to learn how to score bonus points with daily contests, trivia, and more! Make sure you don’t miss out on a chance to win great rewards! http://facebook.com/CheckPoints

SUPPORT: Connect with us for speedy, stellar support:http://support.checkpoints.com

STAY SCAN-TASTIC: Scan products at your local store to keep the coins flowing and your account in good standing. All product scans are uploaded and carefully reviewed. Also, please note that posting referral codes in other app comments is not allowed. Report any violation at http://chk.pt/cp_abuse.

CheckPoints, it’s the rewards app that pays you back!
trackCensoredName: CheckPoints #1 Rewards App And Free Barcode Scanner
trackName: CheckPoints #1 Rewards App And Free Barcode Scanner
releaseNotes:
